channel.title: Issue of the Game
channel.description: Now I just want this thread to be A-a place where we discuss the problems of ToL and B-Set up some form of change. I just want to know what everyone thinks are issues. Personally speaking I like this game and don't think it NEEDS a rework but without one the game would become stale. I personally am in favor of new classes or even a new faction. Some reworks on some classes might be needed or might make them better or more unique. But have at it I can't wait to see this thread.
